examples: (1) Seemingly everyone likes the zebra.(2) The neck of the zebra was nipped by a lion.(3) There was only one big road to cross, but it had a zebra crossing.
(1) 似乎每个人都喜欢斑马。(2) 狮子咬断了那头斑马的脖子。(3) 只有一条大路要过，但它有斑马线。
(1) There was only one big road to cross, but it had a zebra crossing.
(1) 只有一条大路要过，但它有斑马线。

translation: n.拉链n.活力；飞射声v.拉拉链v.飕飕飞过；注入活力
examples: (1) She caught her hair in the zip of the dress.(2) The zip sticked because it was caught by a thread.(3) We need to put some zip into this presentation.(4) Please help me to zip my dress on.(5) Rifle fire zipped over them.(6) These new trains really zip along.
(1) 她的头发被裙子的拉链钩住了。(2) 拉链被线卡住了, 拉不动。(3) 我们需要为这次演出注人一些活力。(4) 请帮我把衣服的拉链拉上。(5) 步枪子弹在他们头顶上飕飕飞驰。(6) 这些新列车行驶得可真快。
(1) I'll need your complete address with the zip code, Mr. Kelly.(2) Then you dial Taiwan's country code.
(1) 希望你告诉我地址全称及邮码，凯利先生。(2) 然后再拨台湾的区码。
(1) The zipper is a wonderful invention.(2) No, seriously, your zipper's down.
(1) 拉链是个了不起的发明。(2) 不，认真的，你的拉链开拉。

(1) They are pulling their troops out of the battle zone.(2) They have declared their country a, nuclear-free zone.(3) Most of China is in the temperate zone.(4) Some people live in Torrid Zone.(5) The Norwegians live in a comparatively cold zone.
(1) 他们正把部队调离战区。(2) 他们宣布本国为无核区。(3) 中国的大部分地区在温带。(4) 有些人生活在热带。(5) 挪威人生活在比较寒冷的地区。

translation: v.急速上升；嗡嗡作响；（镜头）拉近（拉远）n.急速上升；嗡嗡声；(摄影)变焦
examples: (1) Overnight trading caused share prices to zoom up.(2) We heard a jet plane zooming overhead.(3) If you zoom out at this point, we shall get a view of the whole square.(4) The airplane' s zoom carried it above the clouds.(5) It has a built-in zoom lens as well.
(1) 一夜的交投使股票价格直线上升。(2) 我们听见喷射机在头上嗡嗡作响。(3) 如果你在此地把镜头推远，我们将看到整个广场。(4) 飞机的陡直上升使它飞到云层之上。(5) 它也有内置的变焦镜头。

translation: n. 零点，零度num. 零n. (Zero)人名；(意)泽罗
examples: Make sure you are not dividing by zero.It was five below zero last night.The temperature will be above zero.The reputation of the conjurer was rapidly sinking below zero.His hope was reduced to zero.You're dating her? She's such a zero!The probability of a peace agreement being reached is zero.Zero choice is the fastest route to low quality.He is well-known for his capability to zero out taxes for his clients.You should zero in a machine gun at 500 yards.We shouldn't be vague; we should zero in on the cause of the problem.
确保不会除零。昨夜温度是零下五度。气温将在零度以上。魔术师的信誉一下子下降到最低点。他的希望化为乌有。你要跟她约会?她这人一无所长！达成和平协定的概率是零。零选择是通向低质量的最快捷路线。他以能够为客户合法避税出名。你应该把机枪的瞄准器调整到500码的距离上。我们不应该含糊，我们应该把注意力集中在问题的起因上。

translation: n. 动物园n. (Zoo)人名；(朝)朱；(阿拉伯)祖
examples: He saw some amazing sights at the zoo.Did you see any elephants in the zoo last week?I'll meet you at the entrance of the zoo tomorrow.Predictably, the mixed zone was a zoo.This place turns into zoo at this time of day.
他在动物园里看到一些珍禽异兽。上星期你在动物园里看到大象了吗？明天我会在动物园的入口处和你见面。正如所料，混合区里一片拥挤。这个地方在每天这个时候都热闹非凡。
